review: This was the most easiest thing I've ever set up - just plug it in and it's done!  You also get the benefits of Amazon Prime free for 30 days!  I highly recommend the Fire TV stick  :)
author: Linda Sison

review: Awesome! So easy to use since I'm not the tech savy type.
author: Linda

review: Love it, works way better than Chromecast. Very happy with all things Amazon!!!!!

review: Great for streaming video. Prime needs more free programs.

review: Its a nifty device.  We kept it because you're supposed to be able to use it in hotel rooms, so far we have not been able to successfully get this to work.
